About Us

Ground Zero for all things chilli

Welcome to Glasgow's biggest hub of chilli fanatics! The club started over the great quarantine of 2020. As the founding members were bored, locked in their flats and houses, they decided to order a few chilli seeds online; the rest was history. The passion and enthusiasm for the chilli is shared among all the members of the chilli club.

Get started in no time.

Growing chillies is actually dead easy, and by being a member you get access to all of our wonderful resources to help you with potting, germination and growing your own chilli plant! We've partnered with "supplier", so you can get your chilli starting kit when you join!
